title: LEVITICUS with Joel Baden
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary:
I'm joined by Joel Baden to discuss the theological and moral system behind the sacrifice laws in Leviticus, as well the history and composition of the Pentateuch.

Watch this interview on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VmTP8SeQuco&t=2694s
